marklogic.body:
Wow...
This is so similar to what happened to me. I lost my Daddy to lung cancer about an hour before Father's Day in 2010 (I was in 7th grade. I'm in 9th grade now.)... I cried myself to sleep when my mom got that call... I started cutting... Cussing at my mom and grandparents... Tuning out at school...I have developed anger issues, OCD, and depression. I have to take medication now, but it makes me nauseous and gives me Headaches... I haven't lived with my Daddy since I was 2... I didn't see him often until he got lung cancer (which he had for 2 years). I just keep remembering the one argument we ever had... I told him I hated him... I was about 7 when that happened. I'm almost 15 now. I'm just Glad I had the chance to talk to him and tell him I love him...but I regret that I didn't see him more often, tell him I love him more, or live with him... Please, keep me in your prayers... I really need them :/ I'll be praying for you, also. You're story helped me, it really did. I don't know why, though...Maybe because I saw that I'm not alone. God bless you.
